ProcessTemplates.Name: Import contacts from JSON file into Odoo
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template reads contact information from a JSON file in the local fileshare and imports the contacts into Odoo.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"OdooAddress":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The address of your Odoo instance."},"OdooUser":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The email of your Odoo user."},"OdooPassword":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The password of your Odoo user."},"OdooDatabase":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The name of your Odoo database."},"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path to the directory in which the JSON file to be read is located."},"InFileName":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The name of the JSON file to be read."}}

Process.Name: Import contacts from JSON file into Odoo
Process.Description: This template reads contact information from a JSON file in the local fileshare and imports the contacts into Odoo.
